summary: This is an automated out-of-office reply email from an AUSA (Assistant United States Attorney) regarding the Epstein investigation, indicating they will be on vacation until August 12, 2019, and directing urgent matters to other AUSAs on the case.

persons.name: Michael Bachne
persons.context: Person to whom the automatic out-of-office reply email is addressed.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) working on the Epstein investigation was out of the office on vacation in August 2019.
The email indicates the investigation was active and had multiple AUSAs assigned as of August 2019.
The document is an automatic reply, showing routine administrative activity within the prosecutorial team handling the case.
